Squizzy::

She layed on the table, not moving but looking around with her eyes.  
She didn't know who she was or where she was or what was happening.  
She ran an internal diognostic and found that her entire memory bank 
was gone and her old programs were replaced. Her identity and 
everything she once was had been erased. Her past, her history, her 
life had been wiped clean.  But her training and skill programs had 
been saved on a small back up chip and were returning to normal. But 
without her memory banks, it would take a a week for her to renew her 
familiarity with her training again.  She looked up at Zardus, "Who 
are you? What is this place? Where am I?" she then closed her 
eyes,"Who am I?
